doc.title: JK Rowling: The Interview
doc.plot: With only twenty-eight hours remaining before the worldwide publication of the long awaited fifth installment of the Harry Potter Saga, author J.K. Rowling gives as interview to Jeremy Paxman of the BBC. During the interview she gives insights into what Harry Potter means to her, the inspiration behind the novels, what effects he has had on her life and most importantly she hints at some of the story threads that readers will discover for themselves when they finally get their hands on a copy of this long awaited novel.
